response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which holds immense value for us at $1,500,000. Considering its unparalleled quality and potential impact on your endeavors, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,200,000, a significant discount that reflects my confidence in its worth and your appreciation for it. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive opportunity. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
